overview: Zeev Klein’s background includes a variety of management, sales, operations and strategic consulting experience. Zeev is part of the founding team of Landmark Ventures, and maintains daily responsibilities for consulting operations, market due diligence and client development activities. Zeev gained experience working in the VC/Strategic Investment division of Chase Manhattan Bank, where he helped analyze and evaluate technology providers. He was the co-founder of a successful Chicago-based technology services company during the late 1990’s, and has consulted for a number of enterprise software and network infrastructure firms on strategic development, marketing and operational issues. Zeev is active as a member of the Greater New York chapter of Mensa, a graduate from Northwestern University with his B.A. in Economics, and currently attends the Langone MBA (part-time) program at NYU Stern School of Business.
